glsa.title: Konqueror: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Konqueror, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Konqueror is the KDE web browser and file manager.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Konqueror. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted web site using Konqueror, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Konqueror users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since November 11, 2012. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
